summary: This is an email from July 16, 2019, regarding the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY) homepage. The sender proposes linking a victim/witness page to an attached image (EpsteinHomepage.png), replacing an existing one. The email includes a screenshot of the SDNY homepage, which features announcements about the extradition of Jeffrey Epstein and other office activities.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned in the context of the SDNY homepage announcement regarding his extradition.

events.title: SDNY Announces Epstein Extradition
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York announces the extradition of Jeffrey Epstein, as featured on their homepage.

keyFacts: The email is dated July 16, 2019, and discusses updating the SDNY website's victim/witness page with a new image.
The attached screenshot of the SDNY homepage shows an announcement regarding the extradition of Jeffrey Epstein.
The SDNY's jurisdiction and its role in prosecuting federal crimes are described in the homepage text.
The document indicates official SDNY communication and public messaging related to the Epstein case at that time.
